content: sign up for the tellybean knits newsletter to get exclusive newsletter discounts free patterns sneak peeks of upcoming patterns knitting tips and more https //www tellybeanknits com/newsletter-sign-up last year mrs claus hung elf hats on my daughters doorknobs with all the supplies they would need to prepare for santa s arrival reindeer food wishing stones a cookie recipe bells from the reindeers harnesses and candy cane seeds my girls loved their elf hats so much that i wrote mrs claus a letter and asked her permission to share the hat patterns she uses to make elf hats she kindly obliged this simple hat is great for beginners and experts alike it is knit from the bottom up in the round this hat is a quick cute project for any age and any level this basic hat is a crafty canvas that you can adjust and personalize to your liking this pattern includes detailed photo tutorial on how to make a pom pom with a pom pom maker to read about our mrs claus hat tradition click here http //www tellybeanknits com/blog-list/2016/11/24/mrs-claus-knit-a-long check out the free sister pattern mrs claus boxy hat http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/mrs-claus-boxy-hat **sizes ** elf baby toddler child adult s adult m adult l **yarn ** blue sky fibers sweater 55% superwash wool 45% certified organic cotton 160 yards / 100 grams or other worsted weight yarn color 1 shown here as igloo 20 25 30 35 40 45 50 yards color 2 shown here as turtle 75 80 90 100 120 130 145 yards optional pom pom shown here as jelly bean 19 yards **finished dimensions ** circumference 15 75 16 75 18 19 25 20 5 21 75 23 inches length 11 12 13 14 15 15 75 16 5 inches **needles ** us 5 3 75mm & us 7 4 5mm 16 40cm circular needles and dpns in each size or size needed to obtain gauge **gauge ** 20 stitches & 24 row = 4 inches in stockinette stitch on larger needles **notions ** 3 stitch markers & tapestry needle pom pom maker optional **skills ** knitting in the round **level ** beginner
